summary: A teenage boy and his father move to his recently-deceased mother's hometown, where they encounter the ancient Native American cemetery with the power to raise the dead.
cast: Edward Furlong|Anthony Edwards|Clancy Brown|Jared Rushton|Darlanne Fluegel|Jason McGuire|Sarah Trigger|Lisa Waltz|Jim Peck|Len Hunt|Reid Binion|David Ratajczak|Lucius Houghton|Wilbur Fitzgerald|Elizabeth Ziegler|Ken Fisher|Gil Roper|Robert Easton|Judson Vaughn|Bruce Evers|Janell McLeod|Christy Dennis|Rick Andosca|Joe Dorsey|Donna Lowry|Emily Woodward|Amanda Mitchell|J.L. Parker|Bart Mixon
title: Cementerio viviente 2
